newsitem.title: USA: Paymentech names COO, administrative officer.
newsitem.headline: Paymentech names COO, administrative officer.

text.p: First USA Paymentech Inc said Thursday it named Michael P. Duffy as chief operating officer and Philip E. Taken chief administrative officer.
Both positions are new, the company said.
Duffy had been group executive for Paymentech's direct response operations, the company said.
Taken had been general counsel for both Paymentech and for its majority shareholder, First USA Inc, the company said.

First USA's general counsel duties will be handled by Banc One Corp upon completion of the previously announced merger of the two banking companies, a First USA spokesman said. The merger will close June 30.
First USA Paymentech is the third largest processor of credit card tranactions in the United States, it said.
